div.p: Since its inception in 2001, the International PHP Conference has evolved into one of the most significant PHP events worldwide. As a meeting point for PHP professionals, evangelists, movers and shakers, the tradition continues this year from June 1 to 4 in Berlin (Germany). Once again, the conference will explore key topics and core technologies for developers and decision makers.

ul.li: Cool PHP & the Gang: 50+ international speakers and trainers
Full board during the conference: lunch, snacks & drinks
Free swag: certificate, t-shirt, backpack, magazinesâ€¦
Plenty of best practices and networking opportunities

div.p: Join us on Twitter, Facebook and Google+ or visit our website at http://phpconference.com We look forward to seeing you in Berlin!
